## Create your Room

To create your room, please follow the following steps:

- Navigate to the home screen, and select "Create a new room"

![](images/create_room1.png){fig-align="center" width="800px"}

- Write your room name and description. You can either make the room public or protect it with password. Once you fill in the details, click "Create".

![](images/create_room2.png){fig-align="center" width="800px"}

- All the rooms that you have created or joined will be displayed under "Your Rooms" on the left panel of the home screen.

### Create boards within a room

- To create boards simply select the room of your interest, and click the "+" icon under Boards.
![](images/create_board1.png){fig-align="center" width="800px"}
- Fill in the board name, and description. As before, you have the option to protect the board you create with a password. Click "Create".
![](images/create_board2.png){fig-align="center" width="800px"}

- The board you created will appear under Boards in your room. You can simply click on it to get in.
